title: [Bug]: Chat user fields mising spaces in cyrilic encoding
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

Chat user fields mising spaces in cyrilic encoding 

### What package are you using?

tar.gz

### Version

https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/teams-for-linux 2.0.8-1

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Open Teams
2. Look at user fields
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
Expected space symbol
```

### Debug

